sn22.29:1: Sāvatthinidānaṁ. "Yo, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati. Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi. Yo vedanāṁ abhinandati … yo saññaṁ abhinandati … yo saṅkhāre abhinandati … yo viññāṇaṁ abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati. Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
